bug.author: xiaoqx
bug.description:
Two DOS bugs are reported, one exhausts cpu for a long time and the other exhausts memory at mean while. <denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => :3.3: Operating System / Platform => Linux Compiler => Gcc
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Please see the bug10 and bug11 for the details in the following url: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/blob/master/opencv.md>https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/blob/master/opencv.md</denchmark-link>
and testcases in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/opencv>testcases</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/opencv>https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/opencv</denchmark-link>
